com.readystatesoftware.mapviewballoons
Class BalloonItemizedOverlay<Item extends com.google.android.maps.OverlayItem>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.android.maps.Overlay

          com.readystatesoftware.mapviewballoons.BalloonItemizedOverlay<Item>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.android.maps.Overlay.Snappable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MyItemizedOverlay
public abstract class BalloonItemizedOverlay<Item extends com.google.android.maps.OverlayItem>
extends com.google.android.maps.ItemizedOverlay<Item>

An abstract extension of ItemizedOverlay for displaying an information balloon upon screen-tap of each marker overlay.

Author:
Jeff Gilfelt

Constructor Detail

BalloonItemizedOverlay

public BalloonItemizedOverlay(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable defaultMarker,
                              com.google.android.maps.MapView mapView)
Create a new BalloonItemizedOverlay

Parameters:
defaultMarker - - A bounded Drawable to be drawn on the map for each item in the overlay.
mapView - - The view upon which the overlay items are to be drawn.
Method Detail

setBalloonBottomOffset

public void setBalloonBottomOffset(int pixels)
Set the horizontal distance between the marker and the bottom of the information balloon. The default is 0 which works well for center bounded markers. If your marker is center-bottom bounded, call this before adding overlay items to ensure the balloon hovers exactly above the marker.

Parameters:
pixels - - The padding between the center point and the bottom of the information balloon.

getBalloonBottomOffset

public int getBalloonBottomOffset()

onBalloonTap

protected boolean onBalloonTap(int index,
                               Item item)
Override this method to handle a "tap" on a balloon. By default, does nothing and returns false.

Parameters:
index - - The index of the item whose balloon is tapped.
item - - The item whose balloon is tapped.
Returns:
true if you handled the tap, otherwise false.

createBalloonOverlayView

protected BalloonOverlayView<Item> createBalloonOverlayView()
Creates the balloon view. Override to create a sub-classed view that can populate additional sub-views.

getMapView

protected com.google.android.maps.MapView getMapView()
Expose map view to subclasses. Helps with creation of balloon views.

hideBalloon

protected void hideBalloon()
Sets the visibility of this overlay's balloon view to GONE.
